page.title: 19MYTTON & FITZ-GENERAL
page.content:
{MYTTON & FITZ _}TRANSPORT The area is served by a network of small country roads,but infrequent bus services.Clearly,the ownership of a car is vital & this presents some problems to the old or very young.The roads are narrow & are much used by farm vehicles.
{MYTTON & FITZ _}LANDSCAPE & BUILDINGS Both are very small hamlets in tranquil,rural settings.The houses are nearly all nineteenth century red brick or sandstone,with the exception of the timbered fifteenth century Fitz Manor,near Fitz church.Both hamlets are dominated either by farming or by professional _ class commuters & have a peaceful,unspoilt air.
